ValidationRule.description: Cannot change the status of a requirement to "not needed", "Cancelled" or "completed" if the owner field is blank and Date Completed is blank
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(OR(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Not Needed"), ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Complete"),ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Cancelled")), OR(ISBLANK( Owner__c), ISBLANK( Date_Completed__c )))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Status cannot be changed if the owner and date completed fields are blank
